Su rotacin de inventario es de 32 das, y ella planea continuar ampliando sus ingresos mediante inyecciones de capital de trabajo a las cuales estara accediendo con sus futuros credikivas, para que ella su esposo y su hijo tengan siempre ingresos productos de este negocio.
texts.en:
Candelaria lives with her husband and 4 children, who are between 13 and 27 years old. She resides in the 20 de Julio neighborhood in the south of Barranquilla, where she has a general store with her husband. They sell a variety of merchandise, accessories, things for the home, and so on. They started this business 28 years ago, when they arrived in Barranquilla. Candelaria uses her contact with clients to offer a cellphone service and also sells merchandise on credit around the cities of the Atlntico province; she has a large clientele. She hopes to spread the entrepreneurial spirit to her children so that they can have their own businesses in the future.
Although Candelaria acts as a middleman, she does not have enough money available to buy in large quantities, and this is the reason she is asking for a loan. She will buy samples and merchandise, such as women's clothing, plastic containers, and shoes. Her inventory rolls over every 32 days, and she is planning to continue to raise her income by adding working capital with future loans so that she and her husband and son will always be able to make an income from this business.

loan.use: buy samples and merchandise, such as women's clothing, plastic containers, and shoes.

loan.name: Victoire

texts.en:
Victoire is a 38-year-old married woman with five children between the ages of five and fourteen years old. All of her children are in school, and her husband sells a variety of goods.

For the past twenty years, Victoire has been selling cassava. With her earnings she has been able to develop her business and meet the needs of her family.

Victoire is requesting this loan so that she can purchase more cassava to sell at a profit. With her profits, she will save for her family and pay school fees.

loan.use: to purchase more cassava to sell.

loan.name: Nelson Del Carmen

texts.es: Nelson Del Carmen es casado trabaja como comerciante de productos varios como cosmticos, ropa, calzado y otros. Solicita su crdito para invertir en una gran cantidad de productos. tambien tiene su otro negocio que es ofrecer los ervicio de tricitaxi, pues este medio lo utiliza para trsnportar su mercaderia. El se prepara todos los das para salir a ofrecer a sus clientes que lo esperan con los nuevos productos. Cuenta con apoyo de su esposa quien le brinda la ayuda para obtener nuevos clientes. Nelson est agradecido con este crdito que solicita pues tiene las esperanzad de mejorar sus ingresos con las ganancias que obtenga.
texts.en: Nelson Del Carmen is married. He works as a merchant of various products, such as cosmetics, clothes, shoes and more. He is asking for the loan to invest in a large quantity of products. He also has another business offering a bicycle taxi service. He uses the taxi to transport his merchandise. He prepares everyday to go out and offer his customers what they expect in new products. He has his wife's support; she helps him get new customers. Nelson is grateful for this loan and hopes to improve his income with the earnings he obtains.

loan.use: to buy cosmetics, clothes, shoes and more.

loan.name: Ines Dilenia

texts.en: Ines lives in Choluteca, Honduras, and is a single mother of three children. She makes a living by selling candy, chewing gum, and snacks, and primarily sells her wares near a local school. She is requesting a loan of 8,000 HNL to purchase merchandise. In her spare time, Ines enjoys attending church.

loan.use: to purchase bulk amounts of candy, chewing gum, and snacks.

loan.name: Titus

texts.en:
Titus is 41 years old, married, and has three children aged between ten and three years old. He describes himself as business-minded.

For the past fifteen years Titus has run a hardware business in Mombasa. He says his business is profitable with the only major challenge being insufficient capital.

Titus is using his loan of 50,000 KES to buy spare auto parts to sell to his customers. He hopes to grow his business into a wholesale enterprise. In the future, he sees himself diversifying into real estate, educating his children and building a house for his family.

loan.use: to buy spare auto parts to sell.

loan.name: Beatrice

texts.en:
Beatrice is a 43-year-old Rwandan entrepreneur with five children between the ages of 16 and 18, some of whom are adopted. Her husband earns money selling various goods.
For the past five years, she has owned a general store in which she sells toothpaste, shirts, and other goods. This business has enabled her to meet the needs of her family.
She will use this loan to purchase more goods such as rice and cooking oil that she will sell in her general store for profit.
With the future profits generated from her business, she plans to feed her children and accumulate savings for the future.

loan.use: to buy cooking oil, salt, sugar etc. to sell

loan.name: Unidas Con Cristo 1 & 2 Group

texts.en: Elisna is a borrower who lives near La Romana, Dominican Republic, in a rural community. She is the coordinator for her group, named Unidas Con Cristo 1 & 2 (Unite with Christ), a group of Haitian citizens who have made their lives in the Bateyes of the Dominican Republic. Elisna, her long-term partner, and their four children live together in a Bateyes, which is a small rural community built by sugar companies for their field workers, in the tourist city of La Romana. Elisna also has two more grown children. Despite her difficulties, Elisna makes the most of her opportunities and she operates a miscellaneous sales business, where she sells non-alcoholic beverages such as soda, natural juices, and candies and also underwear, which she sells by walking in the street and from her home. Her most difficult challenge is to own her own house; meanwhile she enjoys working and being at home with her family. Elisna is requesting a loan to purchase different products to increase her inventory, such as non-alcoholic beverage, candies, sugar, fruits, and also underwear. She has had two previous loans and has been able to bring changes to her familys life. She thanks you all for supporting this loan.

loan.use: to buy non-alcoholic beverages, candies, sugar, fruits, and also underwear.

loan.name: Thomas

texts.en:
Thomas is a 34-year-old Rwandan entrepreneur with four children between the ages of three and 10 years old. All are in school apart from the youngest. His wife works with him at his place of business.
For the past seven years, he has owned a general store selling beans, rice, mineral water, tea leaves and other items. This business has enabled them to meet the needs of their children and improve their standard of living.
He needs a loan to buy more items to sell in store so that he can continue to make a profit.
With future profits, he will begin building a house to rent out so he can earn additional income.

loan.use: to buy items such as beans and rice to sell

loan.name: Marthe

texts.en:
He is a 39-year-old Rwandan entrepreneur with two children who are five and eight years old. Both of his children are in school. He and his wife run a general store.
He has run this store for the past six years selling sugar, rice, beans and other goods.
He requires this loan so that he can purchase more goods that he will sell for a profit.
In the future, he will save all his profits in order to expand his business.

loan.use: to purchase more goods to sell.

loan.name: Yajaira Del Socorro

texts.es: Yajaira de 33 aos, convive con su esposo y dos hijos menores de edad. Juntos viven en su casa propia ubicada en el reparto modesto palma, Yajaira comenz su negocio hace 8 aos, pues su esposo trabaja como panadero y al mismo tiempo venda golosinas fue ms tarde que deciden juntos establecer una pulpera. Este es su tercer crdito por el que ella se compromete a ser puntual el pago de sus cuotas. Con esto incrementara ms productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azcar, aceite, leche, pan, golosinas y productos enlatados para abastecer su tienda.
texts.en: Yajaira is 33 years old. She lives with her husband and two minor children. They lives together in their own house located in the community of Modesto Palma. Yajaira started her business 8 years ago. Her husband works as a bread baker and he also sold candies. Later, they decided together to open a small store. This is her third loan and she is committed to making her payments on time. With this, she will increase her basic necessity products such as rice, sugar, milk, oil, candies and canned products to supply her store.

loan.use: to buy rice, oil, milk, bread, candies and canned products.

loan.name: Luis Arturo

texts.es: Luis, es agricultor, es soltero, vive con sus padres, l tiene 10 aos de estar cultivando la tierra, aprendi por medio de su padre, trabaja todos los das de 6:00am a 3:00pm, hasta la fecha no tiene problemas con esta actividad que ao a ao realiza. Actualmente solicita un prstamo para la compra de abono, herbicidas para tratar el cultivo de maz y frijol, con esta compra podr dar un buen cuido a la plantacin y tendr menos riesgo que una plaga se la dae. Su propsito es ayudar a sus padres con el trabajo diario, poder tener una buena produccin para tambin garantizarle alimentacin para un largo plazo, as como tambin comercializar parte de esta para generar ganancias.
texts.en:
Luis is a farmer. Hes single and lives with his parents. Hes been farming the land for ten years. He learned from his father and works every day from 6am until 3pm. To date, hes had no problems with this activity that he carries out year to year.
At present, hes asking for a loan to buy manure and herbicides to treat his corn and bean crops. With this purchase he will be able to provide good care to his plants and have less risk of their being damaged by some infestation.
His goal is to help his parents with his daily work to be able to have a good crop yield and also to guarantee their food supply for a long time as well as to sell part of it to earn profits.

loan.use: to buy manure and herbicides for his corn and bean crops.

loan.name: Ricardo

texts.es: Ricardo de 49 aos vive en el barrio San Roque de la ciudad de Barranquilla con su esposa y tiene 2 hijos en las edades de 27 y 33 aos. All en su barrio tiene un negocio mediante el cual elabora productos alimenticios, como chuzos de carne, pollo, chorizo o butifarra acompaado de verduras, que venden l y su esposa por volumen a negocios que comercializan comidas rpidas y tambin directamente ellos, a travs de 2 carritos especiales que l mismo dise, de 1,10 metros por 60 centmetros, compuestos por 3 llantas, un espacio delantero donde ubica su asador y parrillas, una vitrina y un deposito ubicado en la parte trasera, donde guardan los insumos. La idea de emprendimiento surgi desde el ao 1978 en la ciudad de Barranquilla, porque Ricardo antes de iniciarlo en esta ciudad, se dedicaba a viajar de feria en feria por todo el pas, y cuando lleg a vender sus productos durante la poca del Carnaval, pens como dice la cancin del fallecido maestro Joe Arroyo En Barranquilla me quedo y desde entonces se estableci en esta capital, previendo su potencial comercial. Su mayor desafo es su capital de trabajo, pues muchas veces es insuficiente para proveer a los vendedores ambulantes que le solicitan, esta es la razn de su credikiva, con el cual comprar materiales para la preparacin de sus productos y tambin herramientas como asadores, trinches y tenazas, as como recipientes plsticos donde guardar las salsas. Su mayor sueo es tener una casa propia y con ello una distribuidora de comidas rpidas.
texts.en: Ricardo is 49 years old and he lives in the community of San Roque in the city of Barranquilla. He lives with his wife and he has 2 children, aged 27 and 33. He has a business in his community through which he produces foods, such as meat skewers, chicken, spicy sausages or traditional Peruvian sausages with sides of vegetables. He and his wife sells these products in quantities to businesses that sell fast foods but they also sell directly to the clients. They have 2 special carts which he designed, measuring 1.1 meters by 60 centimeters and bearing three tires. The front section consists of a roaster and grills, a display, and a storage container in the back where they keep their ingredients. The business idea started out in 1978 in the city of Barranquilla. Prior to this business Ricardo used to travel from fair to fair throughout the entire country. But when he came to sell his products during the Carnaval season, he was inspired by the song of the late Joe Arroyo, named "En Barranquilla me quedo", meaning "I will stay in Barranquilla". Since then he has established himself in the capital, having seen the potential for commerce. His greatest challenge is his working capital and often it is insufficient to meet the vendors' demand. And this is the reason why he requests a Kiva loan. He will purchase ingredients with which he will prepare his products and he will also purchase tools such as spits, forks, and tongs. He will also purchase plastic containers where to store the condiments. His greatest dream is to have a house of his own and to set up a fast food supply company.

loan.use: to purchase ingredients to prepare his products and to purchase tools such as spits, forks, and tongs.

loan.name: Specoise

texts.en:
Speciose is a 49-year-old Rwandan entrepreneur with eight children between the ages of five and 23 years old. All her children are in school. Her husband works as a driver.
She has been selling beans wholesale for the past 11 years. This business has enabled her to feed her family and pay for her childrens school fees.
She needs this loan to buy more beans and stock them for when the market is better in order to maximize her profits.
With the profits, she will buy different items and turn her store into a general store with more of a variety of goods.

loan.use: to buy beans to sell

loan.name: Elmer Antonio

texts.es: Elmer, est casado, tiene 22 aos de edad, vive con su esposa, poseen casa propia, l es agricultor, dedicado a la siembra de maz, aprendi de su padre y tiene muchos aos de realizar esta labor, de la produccin ha logrado garantizar la alimentacin de su familia as tambin ingresos econmicos. l solicita un prstamo para la compra de tres sacos de abono y una bomba plstica de herbicidas, estos materiales los necesita para aplicarlos al cultivo, con la intencin de tener buena cosecha con frutos sanos. Para Elmer el objetivo que tiene es que a travs del financiamiento poder tener los insumos necesarios para trabajar honradamente en la agricultura, logrando mantener a su familia con todo lo necesario.
texts.en:
Elmer, 22, is married. He lives with his wife and they have a house of their own. Hes a farmer who grows corn. He learned from his father and has been working in this occupation for many years. From his production hes been able to feed his family and earn income.
He is asking for a loan to buy three sacks of manure and a plastic herbicide pump. He needs these materials to apply to the crops with the aim of obtaining a good harvest of healthy fruit.
For Elmer, the goal he has for the loans is to be able to have the necessary supplies to be able to work honorably in farming being able to provide his family with everything they need.

loan.use: to buy three sacks of manure and a plastic herbicide pump.

loan.name: Ephroca

texts.en:
She is a 27-year-old Rwandan entrepreneur with two children ages one and five years old. The eldest is in school. Her husband is a driver.
For the past three years, she has been selling charcoal and this business has enabled her to feed her family.
She needs a loan to purchase more charcoal that she will sell for a profit.
With future profits, she plans to save so she can purchase a motorcycle for her husbands business.

loan.use: to purchase charcoal to sell.

loan.name: Sarah

texts.en: Sarah lives in Uganda. She is married and has four children, one of whom is in school. Sarah has a business selling silver fish. She has been in this business for eight years and she works six days out of every week. Sarah sells her products at the market at retail. Sarah has requested for a loan of 600,000 Ugandan shillings from MCDT SACCO to buy more bags of silver fish from Kasenyi to Mulago in Kampala. She generates additional income by selling raw cassava. The main business challenges for Sarah include transportation and the rainy season. Her goals and aspirations for her business are to own a delivery van, to sell at wholesale only and to build her own house. Sarah lives in a home that she rents. She has access to electricity but doesn't have access to piped water. Her major monthly expenses include rent and feeding the family.

loan.use: To buy more bags of fish to sell

loan.name: Candida Del Carmen

texts.es: Cndida, se dedica a la venta de lcteos y tortillas, vive con una hija de 18 aos de edad; Ella elabora el queso en su vivienda donde alquila, lleva 10 aos de estar en el negocio, lo vende en la zona, porque sale a ofrecerlo o sino los clientes llevan hasta donde ella, a parte de los quesos tambin vende tortillas por los mediodas. Ella est solicitando un prstamo para la compra le leche para la elaboracin de quesos, tambin maz y lea para las tortillas, con estos materiales podr continuar en su negocio y proveer siempre ganancias para su hogar. El sueo de Cndida es algn da comprarse su propia casa, ya que alquilan con su hija y pues espera dentro de algn tiempo tener la posibilidad de obtenerla.
texts.en:
Candida has a business selling dairy products and tortillas. She lives with her 18 year-old daughter. She makes cheese in her rented home. She has had this business for 10 years. She sells in her neighborhood. She goes out to sell the cheese, or her customers come to her, and in addition to the cheese, she also sells tortillas at lunchtime.
She is requesting a loan to buy milk to make her cheese, and also corn and firewood for the tortillas. With these supplies she will be able to continue with her business and will be able to provide continuous earnings for her household.
Candida's dream is to someday buy her own house, since she is renting with her daughter. She hopes that in the not too distant future she will be able to do this.

loan.use: to buy milk to make cheese, and corn and firewood to make tortillas

loan.name: Francine

texts.en:
Francine is a 38 year old Rwandan entrepreneur with 4 children between the ages of 7 and 17 years old. All of her kids are in school and her husband works as a house constructor.
For the past 10 years, she has run her own hair salon. This business has enabled her to pay the school fees for her children and buy her family food.
She requires this loan so that she can buy equipment for her salon and pay her employees.
With future profits she will save so she can build a house for her business.

loan.use: buy salon equipment.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy clothes.

loan.name: Maria Leonor

texts.es: Mara soltera, sus hijos ya mayores independientes, los planes son seguir mejorando la infraestructura de su vivienda. Mujer emprendedora tiene su propio negocio venta de cosa de horno. Su negocio lo tienes desde hace un tiempo inicindolo con fondos propios, aumentar las ventas son sus planes a corto plazo. Con el prstamo construir la pared del lado lateral de la casa por lo cual requiere comprar los siguientes materiales de construccin: cemento, arena, piedrines, bloques, piedras canteras, hierro, tablones de maderas, perlines entre otros. Obteniendo mayor proteccin para su familia.
texts.en:
Mara is single and her children are now adults. Her plans are to continue improving the infrastructure of her house. She is an enterprising woman who has her own business selling baked items. She started her business with her own funds and has had it for some time now. Increasing her sales are a part of her short term plans.
With the loan she will build a wall on the lateral side of her house which will require the purchase of the following construction materials: cement, sand, gravel, blocks, quarry stones, iron, wood boards, metal beams, etc. This will help her to better protect her family.

loan.use: purchase construction materials.

loan.name: Doris Del Carmen

texts.es: Doris, vive con su familia, es madre de dos hijos de 5 y 2 aos de edad, es comerciante de ropa, vende en los municipios cercanos a la ciudad, trabaja todos los das desde muy temprano y regresa por las tardes a su hogar. Ella necesita comprar ropa para el negocio, por lo que solicita un prstamo que cubra la inversin en blusas, faldas, ropa interior, camisas formales y para nios, esta compra le ayudara para aumentar la mercadera y tener ms surtido el negocio, con la esperanza de que las ventas sean buenas y poder comercializarlas rpido. Para Doris su principal propsito con el negocio, es tener una fuente estable de ingresos para cubrir las necesidades de sus hijos, tambin poder ahorrar para el futuro de ellos.
texts.en:
Doris lives with her family. Shes the mother of two children who are 5 and 2 years old. She is a clothes merchant. She sells in towns near the city and works every day from very early on returning home in the afternoon.
She needs to buy clothes for the business so is asking for a loan to cover the cost of blouses, skirts, underwear, dress shirts and childrens clothes. This purchase will help her increase her stock merchandise and have a better selection available hoping thereby that sales will be good and that shell sell out quickly.
For Doris, the main reason for the business is to have a stable source of income to cover her childrens needs as well as to save up for their future.

loan.use: to buy clothes.

loan.name: Vestine

texts.en:
Vestine is a 34-year-old Rwandan entrepreneur with three children between the ages of three and seven. All of them are in school, apart from the youngest. Her husband works as a tailor. For the past seven years, Vestine has run a business selling charcoal. Her business has enabled her to support her children and provide for their needs.
Vestine is requesting a loan to purchase more charcoal to sell. With the future profits from her loan, she hopes to begin construction on her house.

loan.use: to buy charcoal to sell

loan.name: Jaime Enrique

texts.es: Jaime, es agricultor y ganadero, vive con su esposa y una hija de un ao de edad, viven en casa propia, l aprendi su oficio a travs de su padre, tiene ya varios aos de estar en el negocio ya que a por medio de esta actividad logra tener ingresos para su familia. Actualmente necesita pagar una mquina para que le prepare la tierra rastrendola y comprara 20 sacos abono para el cultivo, l solicita un prstamo para el pago de esta inversin, que le ayudara para llevar a cabo los cultivos. Su objetivo es tener una buena cosecha de la presente siembra, comercializarla a buen precio y poder solventar algunos gastos de la familia.
texts.en:
Jaime is a farmer and raises livestock. He lives with his wife and a one-year-old daughter in his own house. He learned his occupation from his father and has been in business for several years now and its his familys source of income.
At present, he needs a loan to hire a tractor to prepare the soil and to buy 20 sacks of manure for the crops. He is asking for the loan to pay for this investment since it will help him with the crops.
His goal is to get a good crop yield from this planting, to sell it at a good price and be able to cover some of his family expenses.

loan.use: to lease machinery and to buy 20 sacks of manure.

loan.name: Rosa Argentina

texts.es: Rosa Argentina tiene 52 aos, su actividad es la elaboracin de pastes de baos. Hace ms de 28 aos que se dedica a este negocio, no ha sido fcil mantenerlo pues la materia prima con la que ella elabora sus productos estn muy caros, la buena administracin de su negocio ha hecho que Rosa progrese lentamente pero lo est logrando. Actualmente solicita este crdito para la compra de hilos, tela, esponjas entre otros. Suea con mejorar las condiciones de vida de su vivienda.
texts.en: Rosa Argentina is 52 and works sewing bath towels, an activity that she has done for 28 years. Her business is challenged by high material prices, but Rosa has been able to grow her sales slowly over time. She seeks this credit to buy cloth, material and padding for her products. She hopes her profits will allow her to improve her living conditions in the future.

loan.use: to buy cloth, material, padding

loan.name: Juan Leonidas

texts.es: Juan, vive con su esposa y dos hijos, l se dedica a la elaboracin de hamacas, fabrica aproximadamente tres hamacas por mes, en su casa de habitacin, las comercializa y de ah mantiene a su familia. Actualmente solicita un prstamo para la compra de materiales para el negocio como son hilos de seda de diferentes colores, tambin necesita comprarse lminas para el techo de su vivienda, con esta compra el prstamo no solo suplir una necesidad del negocio sino que tambin una necesidad familiar, para que estn ms protegidos. El propsito de l es mejorar la vivienda actualmente, aunque para el futuro su proyecto es cambiar la estructura de la vivienda, ya que es de lmina y la quiere reconstruir de ladrillo.
texts.en:
Juan lives with his wife and two children. He manufactures hammocks; he makes about three of them per month at home that he sells to support his family.
At present, hes asking for a loan to buy supplies for the business like silk cord in assorted colors. He also needs to buy sheeting for his houses roof. With this purchase, the loan wont only cover his business needs but also a family need so that they will be better protected.
His goal short-term goal is to improve the house although in the long term he wants to redo its structure because its made of metal sheeting and he wants to rebuild it with bricks.

loan.use: to buy silk cord in assorted colors and also to buy metal sheeting for the roof.

loan.name: Boubacar

texts.fr: Lemprunteur est un commerant de produits alimentaires qui tient une boutique lentre de la ville. Il est mari et son activit lui permet de prendre en charge les besoins de sa famille.Il supporte aussi des charges locatives et de paiement de factures deau et dlectricit.Il a russi acqurir une deuxime boutique lintrieur de la ville.Il a dj obtenu deux prts de lIMCEC de 300000F et de 400 000F respectivement.Afin de renforcer son stock son fonds de commerce, il sollicite un troisime prt de 500 000F pour acheter 50 sacs de riz, 4 futs dhuile et des produits divers. Son ambition est douvrir une grande alimentation au bord de la route nationale.
texts.en:
This borrower is a grocer who has a shop at the city's entrance. He is married and his business enables him to support his family. He also covers the rent and the bills for water and electricity. He has succeeded in acquiring a second store inside the city.
He has already had two loans with the micro-finance institution IMCEC in the amount of 300,000 francs and 400,000 francs respectively. In order to bolster his business fund, he is requesting a third loan of 500,000 francs to buy 50 sacks of rice, 4 casks of oil, and a variety of goods. His ambition is to open a large grocery store along the nation's main road.

loan.use: to buy 50 sacks of of rice, 4 casks of oil, and various products

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase furniture for his home.

loan.name: Srigne Modou

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un jeune clibataire qui a arrte ses tudes aprs un an pass au lyce pour travailler et soutenir sa famille car ses deux parents sont la retraite.Il s'engage d'abord dans la maonnerie et runi un petit fonds qu'il investit ensuite dans le commerce de patte d'arachide, d'huile de palme et de caf touba.Il s'approvisionne dans un grand march sous rgional et revend les produits sur le march local.Aujourd'hui, il arrive prendre en charge les besoins alimentaires, sanitaires, de scolarit et d'habillement des membres de sa famille. Il sollicite un prt de 300000f auprs de l'IMCEC pour augmenter son fonds de commerce en achetant notamment 200 litres d'huile de palme, 20 seaux de patte d'arachide,50 kg de caf touba et du poisson sch. Les bnfices tirs de la vente de ces produits l'aideront beaucoup satisfaire les besoins de sa famille. Son ambition est de construire sa propre maison mais aussi et surtout d'ouvrir un grand magasin de vente de produits agricole dans sa localit.
texts.en: The borrower is a young single man who stopped his studies after the first year of high school in order to work and support his family because both of his parents are retired. He first worked as a mason and gathered a small amount of money which he has invested in selling peanut paste, palm oil and caf touba (a spiced coffee beverage very popular in Senegal). He buys his supplies in a large market in his region and resells them at the local market. Today, he is able to support his family's needs for food, sanitation, education and clothing. He is requesting a loan of 300,000 CFA francs from IMCEC in order to increase his working capital to by 200 liters of palm oil, 20 buckets of peanut paste, 50 kg of caf touba and dried fish. The profits gained from the sale of these products will help him a lot in satisfying the needs of his family. His ambition is to build his own house, but especially to open a large store to sell agricultural products in his area.

loan.use: To buy 200 liters of palm oil, 20 buckets of peanut paste, 50 kg of coffee and dried fish

loan.name: Marta Corina

texts.es: Marta, es una mujer trabajadora, vive con su esposo, una hija y dos nietos, ella se dedica a la venta D. tortillas, con este negocio ha sabido sacar adelante a su familia, posee mucha clientela, pues da un buen servicio, venD. D. lunes a sbado, este negocio lo heredo D. su madre. Ella est solicitando un prstamo para la compra D. lea, ya que por la poca del invierno necesita comprar y almacenarla para que este seca, pues ella trabaja solamente con lea para el cocimiento D. las tortillas, esta compra le ayudara mucho porque tendr una buena cantidad hasta que finalice en invierno. Su propsito es fortalecer el negocio, trabajar ordenadamente con los prstamos y sacar adelante sus ventas, generando mayores ganancias para su familia.
texts.en:
Marta is a hardworking woman. She lives with her husband, a daughter, and two grandchildren. Marta sells tortillas so that her family can get ahead. She has many customers to whom she provides good service. Marta sells from Monday to Saturday. She inherited this business from her mother.

Marta is requesting a loan to buy firewood. During the winter season, she needs to buy and store the wood so that it will remain dry. She only uses wood when cooking the tortillas. This purchase will be a great help because she will have enough wood to last her through the winter.

Her goals are to strengthen her business, work with the loans in an orderly fashion, succeed with her sales, and generate more income for her family.

loan.use: to purchase firewood for cooking tortillas.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy 10 bins of mangoes.

loan.name: Lilliam Maria

texts.es: Lilliam Maria se dedica a la venta de mercadera en general. Hace ms de 5 aos que tiene la experiencia de tratar con sus clientes a diario. ella comenz cuando se separo de su esposo y tuvo que trabajar para mantener a su hija de 11 aos, a pesar que al inicio no fue fcil ha logrado superar los tropiezos que ha tenido ha mantenido su actividad. Este financiamiento es para la compra de calzado, bolsos, ropa en general, toalla, sabanas, cremas y perfumes.
texts.en:
Lilliam Maria sells general merchandise. She has over five years of experience of dealing with her customers every day.
She started when she separated from her husband. She had to work to support her 11 year old daughter. In spite of the fact that in the beginning it was not easy, she has managed to overcome the obstacles she had. She has sustained her business activity.
This loan is to buy shoes, bags, general clothing, towels, sheets, creams, and perfumes.

loan.use: to buy shoes, bags, general clothing, towels, sheets, creams, and perfumes.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy chickens and pigs for breeding.

loan.name: Amparo Dicenia

texts.en: Amparo lives in Choluteca, Honduras, with her three children. For the past 15 years she has made a living by running a small general store. She is requesting a loan of 12,000 HNL to purchase merchandise for her store. In her free time, Amparo enjoys attending church.

loan.use: to purchase snacks, candy, soft drinks, beans, rice, eggs, lard, cooking oil, household cleaning supplies, and personal hygiene products.

loan.name: Paula Mercedes

texts.es: Paula de 46 aos de edad, habita en la ciudad de Len, es madre de dos hijos, su nivel acadmico es bsico solo llego hasta segundo grado de primaria. Ella es comerciante se dedica a la venta de de tortillas. Aprendi este oficio por medio de su madre quien le enseo a elaborar y vender las tortillas, ella 20 aos vendiendo de forma independiente, su hija mayor le ayuda y su esposo en sus ratos libres tambin la apoya adems de los ingresos que el lleva pues trabaja de forma independiente, su negocio lo tiene en su casa de habitacin y vende en todo su vecindario. Solicito el prstamo para comprar 6 quintales de maz y lea para elaborar sus tortillas. Con esta inversin podr adquirir la materia prima ms fcilmente y aun precio menor pues podr comprar ms y un poco mas barato. Uno de sus proyecto que quiere realizar con las ganancia que obtenga es mejorar la condiciones de su local quiere ponerle piso y cambiar el techo para que ya no se le introduzca agua durante el invierno.
texts.en:
Paula is 46 years old and lives in the city of Len. She is the mother of two children and has a basic education since she completed school only through the second grade. Paula is a merchant who sells tortillas. She learned this trade from her mother, who taught her how to make and sells tortillas. Paula has worked independently for 20 years. Her eldest daughter is her assistant and her husband helps out in his spare time. With the support she receives and the income she generates, Paula is able to continue working independently. Her business is located in her home and she sells all over her neighborhood.

Paula is requesting a loan to buy six quintales (1 quintal = 46 kg) of corn and firewood for making tortillas. With this investment, she will have the materials that make her job easier. By buying in bulk, she will also be able to get a cheaper price. One of the projects that she will start is to use her earnings to improve the conditions of her shop. Paula wants to install a floor and replace the roof so that water will not seep through during the winter.

loan.use: to purchase corn and firewood in bulk.

loan.name: Marme

texts.fr: Lemprunteuse a dmarr ses activits de location de chaises et de bche pour les manifestations sociales sur un premier prt de lIMCEC. Ce prt de 100000F a servi lachat de 25 chaises dont les produits de la location lui ont permis de solliciter plus tard deux autres prts de 150000F chacun.Aujourdhui, elle dispose de 3 bches et de 100 chaises et a construit un magasin de stockage dans son domicile.Elle possde galement une machine coudre qui lui permet de varier ses sources de revenus et de mieux prendre en charge ses cinq enfants dont les trois frquentent lcole.Elle sollicite actuellement un autre prt pour terminer son magasin et augmenter son stock de chaises. Elle ambitionne de construire plus tard sa propre maison.
texts.en: This borrower got started with her business renting out chairs and tarps for social gatherings using her first loan from IMCEC. That loan of 100,000 F allowed her to buy 25 chairs and renting those out enabled her to ask for two further loans of 150,000 F each. Today she owns three tarps and 100 chairs and has built a storeroom in her domicile. She also owns a sewing machine which allows her to vary her income sources so that she can better support her five children, three of whom are enrolled in school. She is now asking for another loan to finish off her storeroom and add to her stock of chairs. She hopes later on to build her own house.

loan.use: finish her storeroom and add to her stock of chairs.

loan.name: Ana Julia

texts.es: Ana est casada, su esposo le ayuda econmicamente, su hijo lo tiene estudiando, mujer trabajadora tiene su propio negoci desde hace tiempo vende ropa de variedad, inicindolo con fondos de micro crditos. Su meta es mejorar su vivienda y su nivel de vida. Con el prstamo comprara mercadera como: blusas, para damas, nios y caballeros, pantalones, camisolas, ropa interior entre otros productos de uso personales. Obtendr mayor variedad captando nuevas clientelas. Agradece a la financiera por el apoyo al desarrollo de su negocio.
texts.en: Ana is married and she splits household expenses with her husband. Her son is in school. She is a hard-working woman who has operated her own clothing business for several years, a business she started with microloans. Her goal is to improve her house and her standard of living. She will use this loan to buy clothing for men, women and children--blouses, trousers, camisoles and underwear--and other merchandise that she will resell. A wider range of products will allow her to pick up new customers. She is grateful to the bank for supporting the development of her business.

loan.use: to buy merchandise for her retail business.

loan.name: Moustapha

texts.fr: Lemprunteur est un mcanicien auto. Il a son atelier de rparation mcanique prs de la route nationale et a implant, avec un prt de 150000F de lIMCEC, une canT. de vente de pices dtaches cot de son atelier. Ces deux activits trs complmentaires lui assurent des revenus assez consistants pour prendre en charge les besoins de sa famille notamment de ses trois enfants tous inscrits dans des tablissements denseignement privs. Il sollicite un autre prt de 400000f afin daugmenter son fonds de commerce en achetant 4 cartons dhuile moteur , 2 cartons dhuile moto, 30 croix, 1 carton de cartouches et 1 carton de bougies. Son ambition est de construire un magasin de vente en gros de pices dtaches compltes.
texts.en:
This borrower is an auto mechanic. He has a repair shop near the national road. Next to his workshop, he has set up, with a loan of 150,000 francs from the micro-finance institution IMCEC, a stall selling replacement parts. These two businesses complement each other very well and ensure revenues substantial enough to support his family, especially his three children, who are all enrolled in private schools.
He is requesting another loan of 400,000 francs to increase her working capital by buying 4 boxes of motor oil, 2 boxes of motorbike oil, 30 crosses, a box of cartridges, and a box of spark plugs. His ambition is to build a wholesale store selling complete replacement parts.

loan.use: to buy 4 boxes of of motor oil, 2 boxes of motorbike oil, 30 crosses, a box of cartridges, and a box of sparkplugs

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy 350 kg of seeds and 10 pouches of fertilizer and to lease horses for plowing

loan.name: Gilbert Coly

texts.fr: Lemprunteur pratique lactivit de soudure depuis dix ans. Il fait simultanment de llevage depuis cinq ans grce des financements de lIMCEC. Ces deux activits lui assurent la prise en charge de son pouse et de ses six enfants dont quatre sont des lves. Il sollicite actuellement un prt de 300 000Fpour lachat de 2 vaches. Au bout de deux mois, il revendra ces vaches bien engraisses sur le march local afin den tirer le maximum de revenus. Les bnfices de lopration allgeront considrablement ses charges familiales et personnelles. Il ambitionne dlargir son atelier par la fabrication et lexposition des produits de son atelier de soudure.
texts.en:
This borrower has been operating a welding business for six years. He has simultaneously raised livestock for five years, thanks to financing from the micro-finance institution IMCEC. These two businesses ensure that he can support his wife and six children, of whom four are students.
He is currently requesting a loan of 300,000 francs to buy two cows. After two months, he will sell them well-fattened at the local market to derive the maximum revenues. The profits from the operation will considerably alleviate his personal and family expenses. His ambition is to expand by making and displaying the products from his welding shop.

loan.use: to buy two cows

loan.name: Oscar Agusto

texts.es: El seor Oscar, es habitante del municipio de la concepcin, junto a su esposa la cual actualmente labora en una casa privada para poyar con los gastos del hogar, los planes hacia su familia es mejorar las condiciones de la vivienda ya que el zinc esta deteriorado por las cenizas del volcn, don Oscar desde hace varios aos se dedica al cultivo de caf, la mayor afectacin que se le presenta son las plagas que invaden la plantacin ya que carecen de fertilizantes e insumos. Agradece Afodenic que atrvez de fondo Kiva se lo otorga un financiamiento para inducir en tiempo y forma el cultivo ya que si esto no fuese posible la produccin se perdera.
texts.en: Sr. Oscar lives with his wife in the town of Concepcion. His wife works as a cleaner and they share household costs. Don Oscar wants to repair the house where they live because the roof of the house has been damaged by volcano ash. Don Oscar has made a living from coffee farming for several years. He has to contend with the plant diseases that destroy his crop because he doesn't have the fertilizers and other supplies that he needs for a healthy crop. He is grateful to Afodenic and Kiva for delivering the funding he needs quickly because without the extra funds he would lose his crop.

loan.use: to buy fertilizers and other supplies for his farming business.

loan.name: Seyni

texts.fr: Implante en face de la route nationale, la petite pice qui sert datelier de couture lemprunteur devient de plus en plus troite. Ayant dmarr avec une seule machine, ce dernier en dispose actuellement de trois. Il est mari et a huit enfants qui frquentent tous lcole. Lemprunteur exerce sa profession depuis prs de 24 ans. Il est assist de deux apprentis qui il apprend le mtier. Paralllement son travail, il pratique durant lhivernage lagriculture et llevage. Les revenus tirs de ces activits lui permettent de soccuper de sa famille. Il a dj obtenu et rembourse six prts lIMCEC et sollicite un autre prt de 200000F destin lachat dune machine coudre cornire pour la diversification des ses produits. Son ambition est douvrir un grand magasin de couture et de mieux renforcer son quipement.
texts.en: Facing the national road, the small room set up as a tailor's shop for this borrower is becoming more and more cramped. Having started with a single machine, he currently has three of them. He is married and has eight children, who all attend school. This borrower has been working in this trade for nearly 24 years. He is attended by two apprentices whom he taught how to sew. Concurrently with his trade, he works in agriculture and livestock farming during the winter. The revenues derived from these businesses enable him to take care of his family. He has already had six loans with the IMCEC and has repaid them. He is requesting another loan of 200,000 francs for buying a cornire sewing machine, so as to diversify his products. His ambition is to open a large sewing store and to boost his supplies further.

loan.use: to buy a sewing machine

loan.name: Leyla Marina

texts.en: Leyla lives in San Lorenzo, Honduras, with her husband. For the past six years she has made a living by running a small convenience shop out of her home. She is requesting a loan of 10,000 HNL to purchase merchandise for the store. Leyla is a returning client and has used previous loans to invest in her business.

loan.use: to purchase snacks, candy, soft drinks, beans, rice, eggs, lard, cooking oil, household cleaning supplies, and personal hygiene products.

loan.name: Ana Alejandra

texts.es: La seora Ana Alejandra y su esposo el seor Jesus Ramn son padres de familia y tiene dos hijos. Solicitan un prstamo para poder comprar de los uniformes (ropa y zapatos) y tiles escolares que son libros, cuadernos, lapice, carpetas y mochilas. No cuentan con el dinero necesario para que sus hijos puedan seguir estudiando y no pierdan este siclo escolar. Planea pagar el crdito con una parte del sueldo que recibe el seor Jesus Ramn de su trabajo en una fbrica como tcnico, ya que la seora Ana Alejandra de encargas de cuidar y atender a la familia.
texts.en: Sra. Ana Alejandra and her husband, Sr. Jesus Ramon, have two children. They are applying for a loan so that they can buy school uniforms (clothing and shoes) and other school supplies--books, notebooks, pencils, binders and backpacks, for example. They don't want their children to miss the coming school-year, but they don't have enough money now to send them. They plan to repay the loan from Sr. Jesus Ramon's earnings from his job at a factory. Sra. Ana Alejandra works at home, tending the family.

loan.use: to pay for school uniforms and other school-related expenses.

loan.name: Willian Antonio

texts.es:
Willian de 32 aos, es un hombre trabajador que tiene una pequea tienda en la parte delantera de su casa. Inicio su negocio con ayuda de su esposa (aparece en la foto), con esfuerzo y dedicacin alcanzaron a surtir la tienda con diferentes vveres.
Poco a poco ha mejorado los ingresos de su familia. Tiene muchas aspiraciones por eso trabaja desde las 07h00am hasta las 22h30 todos los das. Vende enlatados, granos, bebidas, confites, dulces etc. Con el prstamo quiere continuar trabajando y comprar confites, enlatados, bebidas para su tienda.
texts.en:
Willian, age 32, is a hardworking gentleman who has a small store at the front of his house. He started this business with the help of his wife (who also appears in the photo). Through their effort and dedication, they were able to stock their store with different food products.

Little by little, the income for Willians family has improved. He has many aspirations, so he works every day from 7am to 10:30pm. Willian sells canned goods, grain, beverages, candy, sweets, and other items. With this loan, he wants to continue working and buy candy, canned goods, and beverages for his store.

loan.use: to purchase candy, canned goods, and beverages for his store.

loan.name: Martin

texts.es: Martin, vive con su hijo y su esposa, administra un mini taller de costuras, tiene 25 aos de dedicarse a la sastrera y aprendi cuando era ayudante de un taller, ha logrado ganar clientela y es de este negocio que cubre las necesidades de su familia. Actualmente necesita comprar materiales para el taller, por lo que solicita un prstamo e invertirlo en telas, hilos, botones, broches, y ciper, con este prstamo podre tener el inventario surtido de los materiales necesarios para atender cualquier trabajo. El objetivo de Martin es que su taller de sastrera se mantenga y as continuar en el oficio que tanto aprecia y que hasta el momento le ha dado todo lo necesario para l y su familia, tambin tiene el deseo de mejorar sus trabajos capacitndose.
texts.en:
Martin lives with his wife and child. He manages a small sewing workshop and has 25 years of experience working as a tailor. Martin learned this trade when he was an assistant at another workshop. He has built up a customer base and his business enables him to provide for the needs of his family.

At the moment, he needs to buy materials for his workshop. For this reason, he is requesting a loan to invest in fabrics, thread, buttons, snaps, and zippers. With this loan, he will be stocked with the necessary materials to perform any job.

Martins goal is to maintain his tailoring shop and continue in his trade. He appreciates everything that has been given to him and his family so far. Martin also hopes to improve his work-related knowledge.

loan.use: to purchase fabrics, thread, buttons, snaps, and zippers.

loan.name: Juan De La Cruz

texts.es: El seor Juan, es habitante del municipio de Ticuantepe, junto a su compaera de vida, los planes hacia su familia es mejorar las condiciones de vida y poder establecer una pulpera, don Juan desde hace varios aos se dedica al cultivo de pia, la mayor afectacin que se le presenta es el robo del producto ya que por la noches no tiene una persona que le cuide el cultivo y sobre todo este carece de insumos ya que la coloracin no esta muy apropiada , Agradece Afodenic atrvez de fondo Kiva por el apoyo que le brinda ya que con las venta pueden pagar en tiempo y forma .
texts.en:
Sr. Juan is a resident of the town of Ticuantepe where he lives with his life partner. The plans for his family include improving their living conditions and establishing a grocery store. Don Juan has been growing pineapple for several years. The greatest challenge he faces is people stealing his product at night because he does not have anyone to look after his crops. He also lacks farming supplies necessary for his crops to attain the appropriate color.

Juan is grateful to AFODENIC for the support it has provided by supplying Kiva funds. Through his sales, he will be able to repay on time and according to terms.

loan.use: to purchase fertilizers and farming supplies.

loan.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: La seora Maria , es habitante del municipio de Ticuantepe , junto a su esposo que trabaja para poyarle con los gastos de la casa ya que tienen hijos que actualmente estudian , los planes hacia su familia es mejorar las condiciones de y poder brindarle estudios a sus pequeos pata que logren realizar una carrera profesional , doa Maria desde hace varios aos se dedica al cultivo de pia , la mayor afectacin que se le presenta son las plangas que invaden el cultivo , lo cual provoca una mala cosecha y grandes prdidas del producto . Agradece el apoyo que le brinda Afodenic atrvez de fondo Kiva , ya que siendo una persona humilde y de bajos recursos la apoyen para poder mejorar su calidad de vida .
texts.en:
Sra. Maria is a resident of the town of Ticuantepe, where she lives with her husband who helps with the household expenses. They have children who are currently in school. The plans for their family are to improve their conditions and to provide an education for their little ones so that they can pursue a professional degree. Doa Maria has been growing pineapple for several years. Her greatest challenge is when diseases impact her crops, which results in a bad harvest and large product losses.

Maria is grateful for the support AFODENIC has provided by supplying Kiva funds. She is a modest person with limited resources, so this support will help her improve her quality of life.

loan.use: to purchase fertilizers and farming supplies.

loan.name: Cayetano Samuel

texts.es: El seor Cayetano, de 70 aos de edad, originario de la ciudad de Jinotega, casado y con dos hijos de 24 y 21 aos respectivamente, se dedica actualmente a la venta de botas y fajas de cuero desde hace 24 aos. Su primer negocio fue la venta de zapatos pero decidi en conjunto con su familia ingresar nuevos productos a su negocio como son las faja y botas. L solicit su crdito para comprar diferentes estilos de fajas y botas ya que es un producto de alta rotacin en el mercado y as ofrecer a sus clientes mejor calidad y variedad. El seor Cayetano nos cuenta que da a conocer su producto en la feria Expica Managua, ya que mediante sta obtiene mejores ganancias. Desea ampliar ms su taller con ms trabajadores y as tener ms productos en su inventario. Su prxima meta es solicitar un nuevo crdito para invertir ms a su negocio.
texts.en: Cayetano, 70, was born in the city of Jinotega. He is married and has two grown children, 24 and 21 years old respectively. He has sold leather boots and belts for the past 24 years. His first business was selling shoes but he decided, together with his family, to include new products such as belts and boots. He requested a loan to buy different styles of belts and boots and now these are top sellers in the market and he can offer his customers better quality and variety. Cayetano tells us that he learned about his products in the Expica-Managua Market and this is the way he gets a higher income. He wishes to enlarge his shop and add more workers and thus have more products in his inventory. His next goal is to request new financing to invest more in his business.

loan.use: to buy belts and boots

loan.name: Cecilia Maribel

texts.es:
Cecilia de 34 aos, es una mujer trabajadora que es vendedora de joyera y ropa. Empez hace 13 aos atrs vendiendo bisutera y ropa poco a poco fue incrementando su capital de trabajo. En la actualidad sigue vendiendo ropa pero con la variedad de joyas.
Trabaja desde las 14h00am hasta las 19h00pm todos los das. Las joyas estn a un valor aproximado de $ 25- $ 30.00, la ropa tiene un aproximado de $ 10.00 hasta $ 30.00. Ella tiene muchas aspiraciones con su negocio por eso quiere comprar con el prstamo joyera y ropa y as darle una mejor economa a sus tres hijos.
texts.en:
Cecilia is 34 years old, hardworking, and sells jewelry and clothes. 13 years ago she started by selling jewelry and clothes. Little by little the amount of merchandise she sold grew. At the moment she continues to sell clothes however she now sells a variety of jewelry.

Everyday she woks from 2 a.m. to 7 p.m. The price range for her jewelry is $25.00 - $30.00 and her clothes $10.00 - $30.00. She has many aspirations with her business which is why she wants to use the loan to buy jewlery and clothes and be able to offer her 3 children better financial support.

loan.use: buy jewelry and clothes.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase basic grains, milk, bread, canned goods, soups, and detergents.

loan.name: Salvadora

texts.es: Doa Salvadora una humilde comerciante de 64 aos de edad, habita en la ciudad de Estel,es viuda, tiene 5 hijos. Ella se dedica a elaborar tortillas y es costurera al mismo tiempo. Inicio en el negocio de elaboracin de tortillas hace 40 aos , tambin se dedico a aprender costura de esta manera ha sobrevivido ella y sus hijos durante todo este tiempo , su negocio lo tiene en su casa de habitacin , ella misma las vende y elabora pero ya no sale a vender pues por su edad no puede recorrer grandes distancias como antes ,vender sus tortillas a los clientes que habitan alrededor de su vecindario . Ella requiere el prstamo para poder comprar maz y lea al por mayor y comprar dos puertas para su casa ya que con la lluvias se le introduce agua en su cocina que es donde tiene su venta de tortillas. Con esta inversin podr adquirir mas fcilmente materia prima para trabajar, mejorar sus ingresos y hacerles mejoras a la infraestructura de su hogar y negocio. Desea invertir para su negocio de costura y mantener el negocio de ventas de tortillas y seguir trabajando hasta donde Dios Le permita.
texts.en: Mrs. Salvadora is a humble seller who is 65 years old, lives in Estel city, widowed, and has 5 children. She makes tortillas and is a seamstress at the same time. She started her tortilla making business 40 years ago. She also learned how to sew and was able to help herself and her children survive all of this time with these jobs. She has her business in her home. She her products and sells them but no longer goes out to sell them since she can no longer walk long distances like before. She sells them to clients who live around her neighborhood. She is requesting the loan to buy maiz and wholesale firewood. She also wishes to buy two doors for her home since rainwater gets into her kitchen where she makes her tortillas. With the loan she will be able to buy essential materials for her job, increase profits, and improve her home and business's infrastructure. She wishes to invest in her sewing and tortilla businesses and continue working where God will permit her.

loan.use: buy maiz, wholesale firewood, and two doors for her home.

loan.name: Vanessa Lucia

texts.es: Vanessa casada su esposo le apoya con los gasto de la casa, trabaja para una empresa privada desde hace un tiempo, sus proyecto es mejorar la infraestructura de la vivienda, por seguridad requiere construir el porche de la casa. Con el prstamo comprar materiales de construccin como: cemento, arena, piedrn, bloques, clavos, alambre, lminas de zinc, golosa, perlines entre otros materiales. Agradece a la financiera por el apoyo para realizar parte de su proyecto. Obteniendo la comodidad y proteccin que necesita.
texts.en:
Vanessa is married. Her husband helps with the household expenses through his job working for a private company, where he has been at for some time. Their plans include improving the infrastructure of their home. For safety reasons, they need to build a porch for their house.

With this loan, Vanessa will buy construction materials such as cement, sand, gravel, blocks, nails, wire, tin sheets, bolts, crossbeams, and other materials. She is grateful to AFODENIC for the support it has provided so that she can complete part of her project. This will help her family attain a necessary level of comfort and protection.

loan.use: to purchase construction materials for building a porch.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase oil pumps, gas leak detectors, refrigerants, and other tools.

loan.name: Joyas Del Pacfico Group

texts.es: Este banco comunal se llama Joyas del Pacfico est conformado por 18 emprendedores, quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros entre los cuales se encuentran repostera, peluquera, preparacin de comida rpida, artesana en cuero, amasandera, bazar, kiosco, carnicera, venta de tejidos, alimento para perro, productos congelados, venta de ropa nueva, ropa usada y venta de tejidos. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la ciudad de Valparaso. Jacqueline presidenta del banco comunal se encuentra en la segunda fila del grupo, vistiendo un polern de color lila, con un pauelo color caf y su cabello es de color negro, se dedica al servicio de peluquera desde hace 4 aos. La dinmica de su trabajo es atender a sus clientes a domicilio, un da a la semana trabaja en su misma casa, donde llegan sus clientes directamente, sin la necesidad de solicitar hora y los fines de semana tambin atiende en su domicilio, pero realiza peinados para eventos. Sus insumos los compra en centros comerciales y liquidadoras de productos de belleza. Con el crdito comprar un fogn, un tubo de gas e insumos para su negocio. Sus metas son tener un local establecido, en el cual pueda instalar su peluquera. Jacqueline realiz un curso de peluquera y se especializ en corte para mujeres y hombres. Jacqueline vive junto a su marido y sus 2 hijas de 24 y 14 aos de edad, adems con su yerno y nieto de 10 meses de edad. Sus motivaciones de continuar con el negocio se deben a que disfruta mucho lo que hace. Ella est muy contenta y agradecida de los servicios brindados por Fondo Esperanza, disfruta de la convivencia con los dems integrantes del grupo del banco comunal, ya que tambin se respetan los valores de la institucin. Comenta que las capacitaciones y el crdito han aportado mucho para su negocio. Valparaso est situado a 120 kilmetros al noroeste de Santiago. Es la capital regional y adems sede del poder legislativo del pas. Es el primer puerto de la nacin y ofrece gran variedad de lugares hermosos y pintorescos, como por ejemplo la casa del poeta Pablo Neruda, ganador del Premio Nobel.
texts.en:
This communal bank is called Joyas del Pacfico ["Jewels of the Pacific"]. It is made up of 18 entrepreneurs, who dedicate themselves to diverse types of businesses, including pastry making, hairdressing, fast food preparation, leather handicrafts, bakery, general store, kiosk, butcher shop, woven fabric sales, dog food, frozen products, new clothing sales, and used clothing and woven fabric sales, All of them live in the city of Valparaso.
Jacqueline, the president of the communal bank, can be seen in the second row of the group, with black hair and wearing a light purple sweater with a brown scarf. She has worked providing hairdressing services for 4 years. The way her business works is that she serves her customers at their homes, although one day a week she works in her own home, where customers can come to her directly without needing to make an appointment. On weekends she also provides services in her home, styling customers' hair for special occasions.
She buys her supplies at shopping centers and from beauty product liquidators. With the loan, she will buy a heater, a gas connection and supplies for her business.
Her goal is to have a permanent shop where she can install her beauty salon. Jacqueline has studied hairstyling, and she specialized in haircuts for women and men.
Jacqueline lives with her husband and her two daughters, aged 24 and 14, in addition to her son-in-law and her 10-month-old grandson.
She is motivated to continue with her business because she enjoys what she does very much. She is very happy and grateful for the services provided by the Fondo Esperanza [Hope Fund], and she enjoys the camaraderie with the other group members, since they also respect the institution's values. She comments that the training sessions and the loan have been a great help for her business.
Valparaso is located 120 kilometers northwest of Santiago. It is the regional capital and also the seat of the country's legislative branch. It is the nation's most important port, offering a great variety of beautiful and picturesque places, such as the home of poet Pablo Neruda, winner of the Nobel Prize.

loan.use: to buy a heater, a gas connection and supplies for her business.

loan.name: Anita Alexandra

texts.es:
Anita es una mujer trabajadora que con esfuerzo y dedicacin ha podido tener una pequea tienda en la parte delantera de su casa. Hace 15 aos atrs ha trabajado para mejorar la vida de sus hijos a trabajado y a invertido dinero en vveres de primera necesidad para tener una tienda acorde a los requerimientos de sus clientes.
Trabaja desde las 08h35 hasta las 22h00pm todos los das. Tiene muchas aspiraciones con su negocio por eso quiere un prstamo para comprar vveres de primera necesidad como arroz, enlatados, granos, etc. En el futuro quiere seguir con su tienda y que su familia tenga buena salud.
texts.en:
Anita is a hardworking woman who with work and dedication has been able to have a small store in the back of her house. She has worked for 15 years to improve her children's lives and has invested money in basic necessity groceries to fill her customers' needs.
She works from de 8:35 a.m. until 10:00 p.m. She aspires to a lot in her business and that is why she wants a loan to buy products of basic necessity such as rice, canned goods, grains, etc. In the future, she wants to continue with her store and for her family to be in good health..

loan.use: to buy rice, canned goods and grains.

loan.name: Cecilia Margarita

texts.es:
En el cantn Rocafuerte se renen cada quince das las socias del Banco Comunal La Unin Hace La Fuerza Del Pechiche. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareos y que son reconocidos en todo el pas.
En este lugar vive a la seora Cecilia, tiene 32 aos de edad, est casada y de esta relacin tienen tres hijas de 13, 11 y 8 aos, las dos mayores estudian en colegio y la menor en escuela. Su esposo es maestro constructor. Ella lleva con su esposo ms de 15 aos pero recin se caso hace 3 meses.
Nuestra amiga se dedica a la venta de zapatos y de productos Avon (productos de belleza, cosmticos, perfumera y accesorios para damas). Ella recorre puerta a puerta tres das a la semana ofreciendo sus productos los mismos que deja a crdito con la finalidad de tener ms ventas y luego cobra cada fin de semana. Tiene dos aos que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien. Tambin cra pollos en su casa para lo cual ha construido una pequea granja.
Este crdito es para comprar zapatos, perfumes, cremas, cosmticos y alimento para pollos. Este es el tercer ciclo en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los pagos son fciles de hacer.
Sus sueos son tener una boutique.
texts.en:
The members of the communal bank "La Union Hace La Fuerza del Pechiche" of the canton of Rocafuerte meet every two weeks. This place is known for the delicious sweets prepared by the locals and they are renowned throughout the entire country.
This is where Cecilia lives. She is 32 years old, married, and from her relationship she has three daughters, aged 13, 11, and 8. The two eldest are in high school and the youngest is in primary school. Her husband is a master builder. She has been with her husband for more than 15 years but they married only 3 months ago.
Our friend sells shoes and Avon brand products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes, and ladies' accessories). She travels from door to door three days per week offering her products to her clients, completing the sales on credit with the goal of making more sales. She collects payments every weekend. She has been in business for two years and it has gone very well for her. She also raises poultry in her house on a small coop she had built.
This loan will be used to purchase shoes, perfumes, skin lotions, cosmetics, and poultry feed. This is her third loan cycle with her communal bank and she appreciates it for the easy payments.
Her dream is to have a boutique.

loan.use: to purchase shoes, perfumes, skin lotions, cosmetics, and poultry feed.

loan.name: Cintya Carola

texts.es: Cintya es una seorita que actualmente vive en el departamento de Cochabamba provincia Cercado, ella viva en el Departamento de La Paz con su familia y para buscar una condicin de vida mejor se vinieron a vivir a la ciudad de Cochabamba, ellos llegaron a la ciudad y empezaron a buscar trabajo o ver algn negocio, ella al venirse de su pueblo ya no pudo estudiar mas, ahora ella trabaja comprando materiales de ferretera de las ferias populares y mayoristas de la ciudad de Oruro, y ella vende sus productos ofreciendo ferretera por ferretera o talleres de carpintera, ella solicita un prstamo para tener ms capital y poder comprar ms mercadera a un precio mas econmico y asi poder ayudar a su familia para montar un pequeo taller familiar, y teniendo ya un negocio familiar poder terminar de estudiar, y ser alguien en la vida.
texts.en: Cinthya is a young woman who is presently living in the department of Cochabamba, province of Cercado. She used to live in the department of La Paz with her family. To seek a better quality of life they came to live in the city of Cochabamba. They arrived in the city and started to look for work or start a business. When she came from her town she was unable to study anymore. She works now buying hardware products from popular markets and wholesalers from the city of Oruro, and she sells her products, offering the hardware to other hardware store or carpentry workshops. She is asking for a loan to have more capital and be able to buy more merchandise at a lower price. In this way, she can help her family open a small family workshop. With a family business she will be able to finish her studies and become someone in life.

loan.use: to increase her investment in working capital.

loan.name: Paula Lorena

texts.es:
En el cantn Rocafuerte se renen cada quince das las socias del Banco Comunal La Unin Hace La Fuerza Del Pechiche. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareos y que son reconocidos en todo el pas.
En este lugar vive la seora Paula, tiene 46 aos de edad y mantiene una relacin de unin libre de la cual ha procreado tres hijos, dos de ellos ya son mayores y uno de 17 aos que estudia en el colegio y es el que aun vive con ella. Su marido es agricultor. Este es su cuarto ciclo en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los crditos le sacan de muchos apuros econmicos.
Ella con la finalidad de ayudar a sus hijos en sus estudios y al ver que a su marido no le alcanzaban para los gastos del hogar hace mas de 10 aos decidi poner un negocio de venta de mariscos y legumbres, esta actividad la realiza todos los domingos en el mercado de Rocafuerte en la cual tiene su pequeo puesto, los dems das vende pescado por el lugar donde ella habita. El pescado lo compra en las playas de Crucita o en Los Arenales.
Este crdito es para comprar pescado, legumbres y otros mariscos.
Sus sueos son tener una casa bien construida.
texts.en:
The members of the communal bank La Unin Hace La Fuerza Del Pechiche meet bimonthly in the Rocafuerte canton. This place is known all over the country for its delicious sweets prepared by the locals.
This is where Seora Paula lives. She is 46 years old and has three children with her common law husband. Two of her children are adults and the third is 17 years old and is attending school. Her husband is a farmer. This is her fourth loan cycle with the communal bank. She likes the loans because they help her financially. Ten years ago she decided to start her own business selling seafood and vegetables to help her children with their studies and help her husband cover the household expenses. She works every Sunday in the Rocafuerte market where she has a small stand. The other days of the week she sells fish out of her house. She buys the fish on the Crucita beaches or in Los Arenales.
She will use this loan to buy fish, vegetables, and other seafood. Her dream is to have a well-built house.

loan.use: buy fish, vegetables, and other seafood.

loan.name: Rodrigo Abel

texts.es: Rodrigo Abel es un joven que vive en el departamento de Cochabamba provincia Cercado es soltero y vive aun con sus papas, el no pudo terminar de estudiar por la situacin econmica de su familia a muy corta edad tuvo que empezar a trabajar para poder mantener y ayudar a su familia, l vive en una pequea urbanizacin al este de la ciudad la cual est empezando a desarrollarse an no cuentan con caminos definidos y durante el da solo ingresan dos movilidades de transporte publico la cual provoca que l no pueda llegar a su trabajo a tiempo. El trabaja en una tienda de carpintera de aluminio que se encuentra a 1 hora de su casa en el centro de la ciudad, el solicita un crdito para poder comprarse una motocicleta y asi poder llegar a tiempo a su trabajo y por las tardes irse temprano a casa para poder ayudar en las labores del hogar a su mam.
texts.en: Rodrigo Abel is a young man who lives in the department of Cochabamba, province of Cercado. He is single and still lives with his parents. He wasn't able to finish his studies due to his family's financial situation. He had to start working at a very young age in able to support and help his family. He lives in a small neighborhood of this city which is still beginning to develop and still doesn't have defined streets. During the day there are only two public buses and that means that he can't get to his job on time. He works in a carpentry workshop that works with aluminum. It is an hour from his house in the city center. He is asking for the loan to be able to buy a motorcycle and thus be able to get to his job on time and get hoe early in the afternoon to help his mother with the housework.

loan.use: to buy a motorcycle to be able to get to work.

loan.name: Lirice Emiliana

texts.es:
En el cantn Rocafuerte se renen cada quince das las socias del Banco Comunal La Unin Hace La Fuerza Del Pechiche. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareos y que son reconocidos en todo el pas.
La seora Lirice es socia fundadora del Banco comunal, es la secretaria del grupo y le gusta porque es un grupo bien unido que se ayudan mutuamente. Tiene 38 aos de edad y mantiene una relacin de unin libre de la cual tiene dos hijos de 11 y 9 aos de edad los mismos que estudian en escuela. El marido es albail.
Es una gran ama de casa que tiene una pequea granja en la cual se dedica a la cra de pollos, a los cuales los alimenta durante dos a tres meses que es el tiempo para que ya estn listos para la venta, despus de este tiempo los faena y luego los vende por libras por el sector donde vive y en pie a comerciante que llegan hasta su casa. Dice que es una forma de ganarse algo propio sin tener que descuidar el hogar ni a sus hijos que aun estn pequeos.
Este nuevo crdito lo va utilizar en comprar pollos, alimento y medicinas para que tengan un crecimiento y desarrollo rpido.
Sus sueos son seguir adelante y que su negocio mejore mas.
texts.en:
The members of the communal bank "La Union Hace La Fuerza" of the canton of Rocafuerte meet every two weeks. This place is known for the delicious sweets prepared by the locals and they are renowned throughout the entire country.
Lirice is the founding member of the communal bank and she is the secretary of the group. She appreciates the group because they are a very strong team who help each other. She is 38 years old and she is married common-law. She has two children, aged 11 and 9 and they both attend primary school. Her husband is a construction worker.
She is a great house wife and she has a small poultry farm where she raises poultry. She keeps and feeds them during two or three months, which is the time needed for them to be ready for sale. After this time she butchers them and she sells the meat by the pound in the sector where she lives, traveling on foot. She also sells to the merchants who visit her house. She says that this is a way for her to earn her own money without having to neglect either her house of her young children.
This new loan will be used to purchase poultry, feed, and medicines to stimulate a fast growth and development.
Her dreams are to move forward and to improve her business.

loan.use: to purchase poultry, feed, and poultry medicines.

loan.name: Jos Luis

texts.es:
En el cantn Rocafuerte se renen cada quince das las socias del Banco Comunal La Unin Hace La Fuerza. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareos y que son reconocidos en todo el pas.
En este lugar vive el Seor Jos Luis, tiene 30 aos de edad, mantiene una relacin de unin libre de la cual tiene una nia de siete aos la cual es discapacitada, no puede or ni hablar. Su mujer se dedica a las tares del hogar.
El tiene un pequeo taller de carpintera en el cual realiza muchas obras como puertas, muebles, sillas, anaqueles y otros producto con la madera y los realiza bajo pedidos, dice que lleva siete aos con su taller y que gracias a Dios no le ha faltado trabajo, labora de lunes a viernes desde las 8am hasta las 18h00, la materia prima la compra en un depsito de madera en la ciudad de Portoviejo.
Este crdito lo va a utilizar en comprar ms madera, pintura, laca, clavos, pega y otros productos para la elaboracin de sus obras. Est en el banco comunal hace dos ciclos y le gusta mucho las charlas.
Sus sueos son tener un taller ms grande con maquinaria adecuada.
texts.en:
The members of the communal bank "La Union Hace La Fuerza" of the canton of Rocafuerte meet every two weeks. This place is known for the delicious sweets prepared by the locals and they are renowned throughout the entire country.
This is where Jose Luis lives. He is 30 years old and he is married common-law. He has a seven-year old daughter who is handicapped. She cannot hear nor speak. His wife takes care of their household.
He has a small carpentry shop where he carries out various projects such as building doors, furniture, chairs, shelves, and other wood products. He takes orders on his projects and he says he has been in business with his carpentry shop for seven years, and thank God that he has not been without work. He works from Monday to Friday from 8am to 6pm. He buys his materials from a wood depot in the city of Portoviejo.
This loan will be used to purchase more wood, paint, lacquer, nails, glue, and other products he needs for his projects. He has been with his communal bank for the past two loan cycles and he really likes the talks.
His dream is to set up a larger shop equipped with adequate tools.

loan.use: to purchase wood, paint, lacquer, nails, glue, etc.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy seedlings and fertilizer and to pay for labor at his coffee farm.

loan.name: Edwin

texts.es: El Seor Edwin, es una persona responsable cuenta con un pequeo SNACK en Ivirgarzama, es soltero y no tiene hijos, pero cuenta con tres hermanos a los cales el ayuda y apoya en su educacin, el se vino de La Paz hace como unos 10 aos con su familia, empez como albail, jornalero, etc., poco a poco el empez ahorrar dinero para poder tener su propio negocio, hoy en dia en cuenta con un SNACK que es uno de los mas concurridos en la localidad. Es la primera vez que el cliente obtiene un prstamo cuyo destino ser el ampliado de su SNACK y as poder ofrecer un mejor servicio a la gente del lugar y por defecto mejorar sus ingresos su calidad de vida de el y sus hermanos.
texts.en:
Edwin is a responsible person who has a small snack bar in Ivirgarzama. He is single and does not have children, but he has three siblings. He helps them out and supports their education. He came from La Paz 10 years ago with his family; he started as a bricklayer and construction day worker. Gradually, he saved money so that he could have his own business. Now he has a snack bar that is one of the busiest in the area.
This is the first time that he has gotten a loan. He will use the proceeds to expand his snack bar and in this way provide better service to the people of the area, and as a byproduct, improve his income and the quality of life of himself and his siblings.

loan.use: to expand his post selling fast food and snacks

loan.name: Lucy Yadira

texts.es:
En el cantn Rocafuerte se renen cada quince das las socias del Banco Comunal La Unin Hace La Fuerza. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareos y que son reconocidos en todo el pas.
En este lugar vive la seora Lucy, tiene 33 aos de edad, est casada y de esta relacin tienen tres hijos de 10, 9 y 2 aos de edad, los dos mayores estudian en escuela. Su esposo es agente vendedor. Ella aprendi corte y confeccin hace varios aos en una academia en Rocafuerte.
Nuestra amiga tiene un pequeo taller de costura en su casa donde desde hace muchos aos se dedica a coser, confecciona ropa de damas y de nios, trabaja a base de pedidos de personas particulares que llegan hasta su casa. Trabaja todos los das desde las 8h00 luego que sus hijos se van a su escuela y hasta las 22h00 y a veces hasta ms tarde cuando tiene que entregar algn pedido, ella dice que nuca recibe ms de lo que puede hacer ya que tiene que dejar tiempo para sus hijos y tampoco le gusta quedar mal con sus clientes.
Este nuevo crdito lo va utilizar en comprar telas, hilos, botones, cierres y otros materiales para la costura. Es socia fundadora del Banco comunal y le gusta por los crditos ya que estos le ayudan mucho.
Sus sueos son tener un taller ms grande con mas maquinas y operarias.
texts.en:
The members of the communal bank "La Union Hace La Fuerza" of the canton of Rocafuerte meet every two weeks. This place is known for the delicious sweets prepared by the locals and they are renowned throughout the entire country.
This is where Lucy lives. She is 33 years old, married, and from her relationship she has three children, aged 10, 9, and 2. The two eldest are in primary school. Her husband is a sales agent. She learned tailoring many years ago at an academy in Rocafuerte.
